page.title: 03KNOTTINGLEY:POLICE & FIRE
page.content: The police cover Knottingley, Ferrybridge,Pontefract and Castleford. They have 3 patrol cars,one without identification.About 200 people are arrested each year.Eight people work daily at the station on shifts.Apart from crimes,street lighting,missing people and road safety are dealt with.The age to join is 18.5 years, the height 177 cm for men, 171cm for women ,with 12 months training. In Knottingley there are no firewomen but eleven professional firemen and eleven part_time men.There are two fire_engines and one emergency tender (E.T.).6 men travel in an engine and two in an E.T. The fire_engine carries 300 gallons of water.The age to join is 18 yrs to 34 yrs,The height 167.5 cm and weight 75kg. 20% of all calls are false alarms.
